description: Allows the entity to wander around while swimming, when not path-finding.

speed_multiplier.description: This multiplier modifies the entity's speed when wandering.

interval.description: Percent chance to start wandering, when not path-finding. 1 = 100%.

look_ahead.description: Distance to look ahead for obstacle avoidance, while wandering.

wander_time.description: Amount of time (in seconds) to wander after wandering behavior was successfully started.
